text: Patrik Chlum (born 1 December 1981) is a Czech skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the Czech Republic Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:People from Jablonec nad Nisou
title: Patrik Chlum
